channel.title: Comments on: RETRO: Jane’s Addiction “Pigs in Zen” live in Detroit 12.04.1988

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: that was before my time, too. i think there's a site somewhere that lists all of rockafella's old shows. i'll ee if i can find it.
item.content:encoded: that was before my time, too. i think there’s a site somewhere that lists all of rockafella’s old shows. i’ll ee if i can find it.

item.title: By: Candice
item.dc:creator: Candice
item.description: Can you remember when it was they came through Columbia, in the 80's, I think.... I was too young to see them, but I think they played Rockafella's, of all places. I'm having a hard time finding anyone who can remember it, but I don't think I made this up.
item.content:encoded: Can you remember when it was they came through Columbia, in the 80’s, I think…. I was too young to see them, but I think they played Rockafella’s, of all places. I’m having a hard time finding anyone who can remember it, but I don’t think I made this up.
